summary: A revenge-seeking man and his foolish friends plan to rob a yakuza gang.
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Kazuya Takahashi|Mickey Curtis|Reiko Kataoka|Taketoshi Naitô|Ken'ichi Yajima|Toshi Shioya|Tomorô Taguchi|Takeshi Caesar|Chika Nakagami|Toshie Negishi|Isako Saneyoshi|Miyako Takagi|Tetsu Watanabe|Eiji Ôki
title: Kamikaze takushî
